text: "Somebody Slap Me" is a song recorded by American country music artist John Anderson. It was released in July 1997 as the first single from the album Takin' the Country Back. The song reached #22 on the Billboard Hot Country Single & Tracks chart. The song was written by Bob McDill and Roger Murrah. ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" !align="left"|Chart (1997) !align="center"|Peak position |- |- |- |align="left"|Canadian RPM Country Tracks |align="center"|35 |} ==References== Category:1997 singles Category:1997 songs Category:John Anderson (musician) songs Category:Songs written by Bob McDill Category:Songs written by Roger Murrah Category:Song recordings produced by Keith Stegall Category:Mercury Records singles
title: Somebody Slap Me
